sentences.en: a good selection of inexpensive wines
sentences.cn: 可供选择的各种价格公道的葡萄酒

sentences.en: But could slowing HIV be as simple as using an inexpensive spermicide?
sentences.cn: 但是,降低HIV能像用一种廉价杀精剂那么简单 吗 ?
舒服而价廉的住宿处, 人人都可享受.

sentences.en: Fish is inexpensive, easy to cook and very digestible.
sentences.cn: 鱼价格便宜，容易烹调，且味美可口。

sentences.en: It is inexpensive to buy and economical to run.
sentences.cn: 它价格低廉,行驶费用也经济.

sentences.en: Luxembourg produces six reputable and relatively inexpensive white wines.
sentences.cn: 卢森堡生产六种价格相对低廉的名牌白葡萄酒.
打表计价的出租车相对便宜。

sentences.en: Painting is a relatively inexpensive way to enhance your home.
sentences.cn: 粉刷是美化居室的一种相对较便宜的方式。

sentences.en: She found a small, inexpensive motel on the outskirts of the town; it was barren and unlovely.
sentences.cn: 她在城郊找了一家便宜的小汽车旅馆，那旅馆既简陋又难看。

sentences.en: The hotel is ideally situated for hikers looking for an inexpensive place to stay.
sentences.cn: 这家宾馆对寻求廉价住所的长途旅行者再合适不过了.

sentences.en: This kind of car is inexpensive.
This suit of clothing is more inexpensive than that sheath.
We stocked a wide range of inexpensive wines.
Which one kinds are the most inexpensive?

words.tran_cn: 廉价地，不践地；花费不多地

trans.tran_en: cheap – use this to show approval
